ConfigurationOption.Value: select wh.wonum, wh.description as Hazard_Desc, p.description as precaution, wl.assetnum, wl.location, wl.applyseq, wl.removeseq, wh.siteid, wh.hazardid, wh.wohazardid, p.precautionid, wp.wohazardprecid, wo.workorderid, wl.tagoutid from wohazard wh join workorder wo on wh.wonum = wo.wonum and wh.siteid = wo.siteid left join wohazardprec wp on wh.wonum = wp.wonum and wh.hazardid = wp.hazardid and wh.siteid = wp.siteid left join precaution p on wp.precautionid = p.precautionid and wp.siteid = p.siteid join wosafetylink wl on wh.wonum = wl.wonum and wh.hazardid = wl.hazardid and wh.siteid = wl.siteid and wl.tagoutid is not null
